channel.title: [317] OverloadX - Removed MySQL - Unleeched
channel.description:
Okay, so, this is for people who couldn't modify three files in order to remove the MySQL.
[b]Original thread[/b]: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,471497.0.html
[b]Removed MySQL[/b]: http://uppit.com/4pff0f0i9po9/Overload_X_Removed_MySQL.rar
Enjoy and have fun :]
[size=10pt][b]SOME FAG CALLED "CHEESY" FROM ROONSERVER JUST RE-WORDED THIS AND RELEASED WITHOUT GIVING ME CREDITS FOR REMOVING THE MYSQL. lol.[/b][/size]

item.title: [317] OverloadX - Removed MySQL - Unleeched
item.dc:creator: @I_InDrEk_I I InDrEk I
item.description:
@I_InDrEk_I wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:52, topic:375780”][quote author=SuomiPiru link=topic=471713.msg3569749#msg3569749 date=1302950158]
i keep getting this when i open runserver.bat

“Error occurred during initialization of VM
Could not reserve enough space for object heap
Could not create the Java virtual machine.
Continue ect . . .”
[/quote]that means too much memory is being used. Restart your computer and try again. If that doesn’t work uninstall java and reinstall.

This honestly isn’t hard…remove the database packets remove a few lines in server.java and a couple of other places and you got it made.[/quote]No, you dont need to restart your computer or reinstall java. You just need to lower the memory being used of your server. Example:

@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx1500m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause You need to lower the -Xmx1500m-

@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx500m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pauseLike this.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] OverloadX - Removed MySQL - Unleeched
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“jack the w, post:66, topic:375780”]This is what i got:

Error occurred during initialization of VM
Could not reserve enough space for object heap
Could not create the Java virtual machine.
Press any key to continue . . .

I think it has something to do with my
crappy computer…[/quote]
You need to replace the code in it. Find another server’s run.bat, and copy + paste it into there. GL.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] OverloadX - Removed MySQL - Unleeched
item.dc:creator: @aivaroza4 aivaroza4
item.description:
@aivaroza4 wrote:

[quote=“zo0york, post:41, topic:375780”]Anyone know how to stop the spam in the CMD window? I can’t find whats printing it.

Ex: 4 14 6 4 8 Being printed in CMD window.

[/quote]

Go to WalkingHandler.java,Then search for “System.out.println(direction);”
And change it to this “//System.out.println(direction);”

Read full topic

and the ppl who say “you dont deserve the server if you dont know it”

its freaking me out, i can code RSPS but i have no expierence with MySQL
and in instead ppl say stop coding they rather can say how to remove

cuz there are no tutorials out there, and evryone saying “delete some lines”

WHAT FUCKING LINES!!! tell us…

if no1 ever explain or help how are we supposed to learn it ever?

if u wanna learn chinees u need someone who make a book or help u… this is kinda the same[/quote]

This ^^^^ is completley true. if everyone wants to bitch about helping someone, why waste ur time bitching when u can help that person learn. after you do that, thats one less person to worry about or just dont comment at all. these people are trying to learn and thats what u had to do at one point and time. and if u cant respect that, then us moparscapians cant respect you.
